001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.persistentsubscriber.filter;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.CommonMetadata;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
006
007import java.util.function.Predicate;
008
009/**
010 * Filter for when you don't want to process old events, and just want to skip everything up until a specified timestamp.
011 *
012 * @param timestampInclusive
013 */
014public record SkipUntilTimestampFilter(long timestampInclusive)
015    implements Predicate<WithMetadata<ArrayNode>>
016{
017    @Override
018    public boolean test(WithMetadata<ArrayNode> arrayNodeWithMetadata) {
019        CommonMetadata commonMetadata = arrayNodeWithMetadata::metadata;
020        return commonMetadata.getTimestamp() >= timestampInclusive;
021    }
022}
